class.name: Multigoal
class.brief_description: A [Multigoal] represents multiple goals to be achieved in a [Plan] and [Domain].
class.description: The [Multigoal] represents a set of goals that a [Plan] needs to be achieved and provides methods for managing the state variables associated with these goals.

method.name: method_goals_not_achieved
method.description: Verifies if the goals that have not been achieved given the current state and [Multigoal].

method.name: method_split_multigoal
method.description: Verifies if a specific goal has been achieved given the current state, method, state variable, arguments, desired values, depth, and verbosity level.

method.name: method_verify_multigoal
method.description: Verifies if a [Multigoal] has been achieved given the current state, method, multi-goal, depth, and verbosity level.

method.name: state_variables
method.description: Returns an array of state variables associated with the [Multigoal].

members.member: The current state of the [Multigoal], represented as a [Dictionary] of state variables.
